movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: An okay film!
review: As a film, it was good, but as a Star Wars film, it was disappointing.

title: Easily the best horror movie of the 2010s
review: This film was phenomenal. The acting was top notch. Filled with twist and turns with great direction. Definitely check this film out.

title: A masterpiece in the comic book movie genre!
review: This movie was phenomenal. This is hands down M. Night Shyamalan's best film that he has ever directed and it's one of the greatest comic book movies I have ever seen in my life.

title: A masterpiece in cinema!
review: Like many other people have said, this is one of the greatest films of all time.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
title: An epic conclusion to the greatest trilogy of all time.
review: Return of the Jedi has everything that you would want in a finale.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Fanatastic!
review: I really enjoyed this film, but there are some scenes where it panders to the idiotic fans, who don't recognize what makes Star Wars great from the beginning.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
title: A major disappointment!
review: As a Star Wars fan, this film is a spit in the faces to the entire fan base.

title: An outstanding sequel
review: The Godfather Part 2 is a perfect example of a phenomenal follow-up to the original.

title: The greatest action film of all time
review: The first installment was phenomenal, but this one was a masterpiece in the action genre.

title: The greatest animated movie of all time!
review: This movie is phenomenal. The animation is amazing.

title: What an epic finale!
review: This was the single greatest Marvel movie I've seen ever and it has everything that you could ever ask for in a finale.

title: Phenomenal!
review: Despite the fact that it was directed by Paul W.S. Anderson, one of my least favorite directors of all time. I actually enjoyed this film from a guilty pleasure standpoint.

title: Best film of 1998!
review: Saving Private Ryan is one of the greatest war films I've seen.

title: What a masterpiece!
review: The first story of the film is your typical cliched romance comedy, but I'm okay with in this film. The second story is an amazing survival story.

title: What a disappointment!
review: While, I enjoyed Part 3, it suffers from the pressure from the first two films and a horrible performance by Sofia Coppola.

title: A masterpiece in the action genre!
review: This film is not only the greatest action movie of all time, not only is it the greatest Christmas movie of all time, this film is one of the greatest of all time.

title: An all-time classic for the ages!
review: After watching this film, I can say that Psycho (196) is my favorite horror film of all time.

title: Best film of the 2010s!
review: Not only is this Christopher Nolan's masterpiece, but it's also one of my favorite films of all time.

title: Simply Phenomenal!
review: Parasite is one of the best movies that I've seen in 2019.

title: The beginning of an epic series
review: Iron Man is an absolutely classic in the superhero genre and featuring a phenomenal performance by Robert Downey Jr. This film was only the beginning of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: Watch the extended version! It's awesome!
review: This film was amazing. Ben Affleck was easily the best part of this movie, he brought his a-game as Batman. The chemistry between Affleck & Irons was outstanding. Gal Gadot did a great job as Wonder Woman. The fight between Batman & Superman was awesome. The final fight with Doomsday was outstanding in every way possible. However, there is only one problem with this film and that's Jesse Eisenberg as Lex Luthor. He was sadly missed cast in this role, but then again it's really the fault of Warner Bros. Studios. Overall, this film deliver on almost every level. I highly recommend that you watch the extended version of this film.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
title: Star Wars is back!
review: The Star Wars that we know and love is back and better than ever.

title: One of the most terrifying films ever!
review: Thank you, Wes Cavern for giving us Freddy Krueger.

title: Best film of 1999
review: The Matrix is one of the most stylish and most substance film in the action genre.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
title: The beginning of the greatest trilogy of all time
review: Star Wars is one of the greatest movies of all time.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
title: The best film I've ever seen
review: The Empire Strikes Back is my favorite movie of all time.

title: The greatest Coming-of-Age film of all time!
review: This film is a masterpiece in the history of cinema. It's a phenomenal display of pure acting.

title: A true landmark in cinema!
review: This is the one of the greatest and best crafted gangster films I've ever seen in my life.
